Hello,

@Jeff : "Alexandre, you mention that CMAES are faster than SAES. Do=
es that imply that SAES has also been shown to work? If so, was it on a smo=
oth fitness landscape?"

I'm not personally aware of works using SAES as an=
 optimizer. My guess that it might be used in case of very large problems (=
for an evolutionary algorithm), like 1000 dimensions. I found some works us=
ing SAES by "googling" around though...

Regards,
Alexandre Devert
